Goodra (TCG)

  • Language
  • Watch
  • View source
← #0705: Sliggoo
Pokémon
#0707: Klefki →

Goodra has been featured on 9 different cards since it debuted in the Flashfire expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Goodra cards are normally Dragon-type Stage 2 Pokémon. As a Dragon-type, their attacks normally have costs including and Energy. Hisuian Goodra's attacks as a Dragon-type normally have costs including and Energy.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Goodra

Goodra
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
